name: On the front line
description: "On the front line" - tank simulator. Action takes place during World War II. Battles are unilaterally - for the Red Army. Action in the game takes place on two large locations. Sequential execution of combat missions.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: 2 ghz Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: nVidia GeForce 9600 gt DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 2 GB available space
